    • Constructor Detail

      • LSH

        public LSH(int[][] minHashMatrix,
           java.lang.String[] docNames,
           int bands)
        Constructs an instance of LSH
        Parameters:
        minHashMatrix - The MinHash matrix containing the signatures to compare
        docNames - An array of Strings consisting of names of documents/files in the document collection
        bands - The number of bands to be used to perform locality sensitive hashing.
